document_data.name: Dlurn
document_data.mainbody: '''Dlurn''' were a species of fish endemic to the [[Lake of Steam]], most commonly found in large numbers in the harbor of [[Derlusk]] and other inlets in its proximity.{{Cite polyhedron/117/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Dapplegate and Derlusk|21}}{{Cite web/The Border Kingdoms/Derlusk}}
document_data.Description: These fish were small in size and had a green coloration to them.
document_data.History: In the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], dlurn fish was commonly sought after by the people of Derlusk for the production of [[dlurn paste]], a popular fish paste.
